mapper.sql: SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, A.A_WRITE_DATE A_WRITE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, AC.AC_KEY AC_KEY, AC.A_KEY_FK A_KEY_FK, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, AC.AC_CONDITION AC_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVAL_DATE AC_APPROVAL_DATE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON(AC.A_KEY_FK=A.A_KEY)
mapper.select: SELECT A_KEY , A.C_KEY_FK , DIV_DOCTYPE_FK , A_TITLE , A_CONTENT , A_WRITER_FK , TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A_CONDITION , D.DIV_INFO AS DOCTYPE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DIVISION D ON(A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_WRITER_FK = #{eKey}

SELECT A_KEY , A.C_KEY_FK , DIV_DOCTYPE_FK , A_TITLE , A_CONTENT , A_WRITER_FK , TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A_CONDITION , D.DIV_INFO AS DOCTYPE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DIVISION D ON(A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_WRITER_FK = #{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 0

SELECT A_KEY , A.C_KEY_FK , DIV_DOCTYPE_FK , A_TITLE , A_CONTENT , A_WRITER_FK , TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A_CONDITION , D.DIV_INFO AS DOCTYPE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DIVISION D ON(A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_WRITER_FK = #{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 1

SELECT A_KEY , A.C_KEY_FK , DIV_DOCTYPE_FK , A_TITLE , A_CONTENT , A_WRITER_FK , TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A_CONDITION , D.DIV_INFO AS DOCTYPE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN DIVISION D ON(A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_WRITER_FK = #{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 2

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE, E.E_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=#{eKey}

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE, E.E_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=#{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 0

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE, E.E_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=#{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 1

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(A_COMPLETE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE, E.E_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=#{eKey} AND A_CONDITION = 2

SELECT DISTINCT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, A.A_COMPLETE_DATE A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, E.E_NAME E_NAME, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON(A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK = D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_KEY IN (SELECT A_KEY_FK FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A_KEY_FK ORDER BY A_KEY_FK,DIV_INFOLEVEL DESC,E_NAME)RNUM,A_KEY_FK,AC_APPROVER_FK FROM APPROVAL_CONDITION AC JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (E.E_JOBCODE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_KEY_FK IN (SELECT A_KEY FROM APPROVAL WHERE A_CONDITION=0) AND AC_CONDITION=0 GROUP BY A_KEY_FK,AC_APPROVER_FK,DIV_INFOLEVEL,E_NAME) WHERE RNUM=1 AND AC_APPROVER_FK=#{eKey})

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, D.DIV_INFO DOCTYPE, E.E_NAME FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN DIVISION D ON (A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK=D.DIV_KEY) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E.E_KEY) WHERE A.A_CONDITION=0 AND AC.AC_APPROVER_FK =#{eKey} AND AC.AC_CONDITION=0

SELECT A.A_KEY A_KEY, A.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, A.DIV_DOCTYPE_FK DIV_DOCTYPE_FK, A.A_TITLE A_TITLE, A.A_CONTENT A_CONTENT, A.A_WRITER_FK A_WRITER_FK, TO_CHAR(A_WRITE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') A_WRITE_DATE, A.A_COMPLETE_DATE A_COMPLETE_DATE, A.A_CONDITION A_CONDITION, AC.AC_KEY AC_KEY, AC.A_KEY_FK, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, AC.AC_CONDITION AC_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVAL_TYPE, TO_CHAR(AC_APPROVAL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AC_APPROVAL_DATE, E.E_NAME E_NAME, DIV.DIV_INFO JOB, DIV2.DIV_INFO DEPARTMENT, E2.E_NAME E_NAME, DIV3.DIV_INFO JOB, DIV4.DIV_INFO DEPARTMENT, ATTA.ATTA_KEY ATTA_KEY, ATTA.ATTA_LOCATION ATTA_LOCATION, ATTA.ATTA_FILENAME ATTA_FILENAME, ATTA.ATTA_FILEPATH ATTA_FILEPATH, ATTA.ATTA_FILESIZE ATTA_FILESIZE FROM APPROVAL A JOIN APPROVAL_CONDITION AC ON (A.A_KEY=AC.A_KEY_FK) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN EMPLOYEE E2 ON (A.A_WRITER_FK=E2.E_KEY) LEFT JOIN DIVISION DIV ON (E.E_JOBCODE_FK=DIV.DIV_KEY) LEFT JOIN DIVISION DIV2 ON (E.E_DEPART_FK=DIV2.DIV_KEY) LEFT JOIN DIVISION DIV3 ON (E2.E_JOBCODE_FK=DIV3.DIV_KEY) LEFT JOIN DIVISION DIV4 ON (E2.E_DEPART_FK=DIV4.DIV_KEY) LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTA_FILEPATH='approval') ATTA ON (A.A_KEY=ATTA.ATTA_LOCATION) WHERE A.A_KEY=#{aKey} ORDER BY DIV.DIV_INFOLEVEL DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT AC.AC_KEY AC_KEY, AC.A_KEY_FK A_KEY_FK, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, AC.AC_CONDITION AC_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVAL_DATE AC_APPROVAL_DATE, E.E_KEY E_KEY, E.E_NO E_NO, E.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, E.E_TYPE E_TYPE, E.E_ID E_ID, E.E_PWD E_PWD, E.E_NAME E_NAME, E.E_JOBCODE_FK E_JOBCODE_FK, E.E_DEPART_FK E_DEPART_FK, E.E_ADDRESS E_ADDRESS, E.E_EXTEN E_EXTEN, E.E_PHONE E_PHONE, E.E_EMAIL E_EMAIL, E.E_BIRTH E_BIRTH, E.E_HIRE_DATE E_HIRE_DATE, E.E_ENT_DATE E_ENT_DATE, E.E_ENT_YN E_ENT_YN, E.E_PHOTO E_PHOTO, DIV.DIV_INFO JOB, DIV.DIV_INFOLEVEL, DIV2.DIV_INFO DEPARTMENT FROM APPROVAL_CONDITION AC JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION DIV ON (E.E_JOBCODE_FK=DIV.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION DIV2 ON (E.E_DEPART_FK=DIV2.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_KEY_FK =#{aKeyFk} AND AC_CONDITION=0) ORDER BY DIV_INFOLEVEL DESC,E_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT AC.AC_KEY AC_KEY, AC.A_KEY_FK A_KEY_FK, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, AC.AC_CONDITION AC_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVAL_DATE AC_APPROVAL_DATE, E.E_KEY E_KEY, E.E_NO E_NO, E.C_KEY_FK C_KEY_FK, E.E_TYPE E_TYPE, E.E_ID E_ID, E.E_PWD E_PWD, E.E_NAME E_NAME, E.E_JOBCODE_FK E_JOBCODE_FK, E.E_DEPART_FK E_DEPART_FK, E.E_ADDRESS E_ADDRESS, E.E_EXTEN E_EXTEN, E.E_PHONE E_PHONE, E.E_EMAIL E_EMAIL, E.E_BIRTH E_BIRTH, E.E_HIRE_DATE E_HIRE_DATE, E.E_ENT_DATE E_ENT_DATE, E.E_ENT_YN E_ENT_YN, E.E_PHOTO E_PHOTO, DIV.DIV_INFO JOB, DIV.DIV_INFOLEVEL, DIV2.DIV_INFO DEPARTMENT FROM APPROVAL_CONDITION AC JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION DIV ON (E.E_JOBCODE_FK=DIV.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION DIV2 ON (E.E_DEPART_FK=DIV2.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_KEY_FK =#{aKeyFk} AND AC_CONDITION=0) ORDER BY DIV_INFOLEVEL,E_NAME) WHERE ROWNUM =1

SELECT AC.AC_KEY AC_KEY, AC.A_KEY_FK A_KEY_FK, AC.AC_APPROVER_FK AC_APPROVER_FK, AC.AC_CONDITION AC_CONDITION, AC.AC_APPROVAL_TYPE AC_APPROVAL_TYPE, AC.AC_APPROVAL_DATE AC_APPROVAL_DATE, E.E_KEY E_KEY, E.E_NAME E_NAME, J.DIV_INFO JOB, J.DIV_INFOLEVEL DIV_INFOLEVEL, D.DIV_INFO DEPARTMENT FROM APPROVAL_CONDITION AC JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (AC.AC_APPROVER_FK=E.E_KEY) JOIN DIVISION J ON (E.E_JOBCODE_FK=J.DIV_KEY) JOIN DIVISION D ON (E.E_DEPART_FK=D.DIV_KEY) WHERE A_KEY_FK=#{aKey} AND AC_CONDITION=0
SELECT JP_KEY , A_KEY_FK , TO_CHAR(JP_WORKING_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') JP_WORKING_DATE , JP_COOPERATION FROM JOB_PROPSAL WHERE A_KEY_FK=#{aKey}
SELECT VF_KEY, A_KEY_FK, VF_TYPE, VF_STARTDATE, VF_ENDDATE, VF_HALFFLAG, VF_REASON FROM VACATION_FORM WHERE A_KEY_FK = #{aKey}
mapper.update: UPDATE APPROVAL_CONDITION SET AC_CONDITION=#{acCondition}, AC_APPROVAL_TYPE=#{acApprovalType}, AC_APPROVAL_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE AC_KEY=#{acKey}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO APPROVAL VALUES ( SEQ_APPROVAL.NEXTVAL,#{cKeyFk},#{divDoctypeFk},#{aTitle},#{aContent},#{aWriterFk},SYSDATE,null,0 )
SELECT SEQ_APPROVAL.CURRVAL FROM dual
